text_block_list.text:
Therefore, we will be hosting 
the Tracen Academy Pretty Grand Prix!!
text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa

text_block_list.text:
At the whim of Chairwoman Akikawa, this grand prix had begun. 
Murmurs began to spread amongst the students in the gymnasium.

The purpose! As Uma Musume, you all 
must have the ability to adapt to any situation!
text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa

text_block_list.text:
The format! The competition will consist of three parts; a 
performance, a speech, and a race! The 4 students that are chosen 
from the preliminary rounds will advance to the finals.
text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa

text_block_list.text:
The application process! Entries will open tomorrow! You will be 
able to nominate yourself and others! We are anxiously awaiting 
your participation!!
text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa

text_block_list.text:
What an amazing event…! 
I'll be nominating you, City-san!
text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin

text_block_list.text: Wha!? Yukino, are you being serious!?
text_block_list.name: Gold City

text_block_list.text:
Just hearing the words "Grand Prix" gets me 
super excited! It'll be like a hall of fame for cute girls ♪
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: Haa… There goes the Chairwoman doing something stupid again…
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
<i>I'd love to see Groove-senpai 
participate in the Grand Prix…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober

text_block_list.text:
The Pretty Grand Prix… Of course the Chairwoman would come up 
with something like that. But since Curren just transferred here 
it doesn't really matter to me…
Onee-chan! Listen to this ☆
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text: Onee-chan! Listen to this ☆
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text: You see! I just signed up for the Grand Prix!
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
Ehehe ♪ Well it's called the "Pretty" Grand Prix, right? 
Doesn't that seem like an event made for your lovely Curren?
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
Onee-chan, I hope you'll cheer your heart out for me ♪ 
That way I'll be able to give it my all!
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
Onee-chan, I hope you'll cheer your heart out for me ♪ 
That way I'll be able to give it my all!
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
While I'm glad to see she's feeling motivated, 
focusing on training for the Grand Prix 
might make her neglect her normal training…

Of course I'll try my hardest in my regular training. 
I'll try my hardest, but… 
this Grand Prix is really important to me!
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
After all, it'll help me show 
everyone just how cute Curren is ♪
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
Is she really only doing this for attention…? 
I feel like I still know nothing about who she really is.
choice_data_list: You'll do anything to enter, huh?
You'll do anything to enter, huh?

text_block_list.text:
Well the thing is! 
I wanna show you just how brightly I can shine!
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
Well the thing is! 
I wanna show you just how brightly I can shine!
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text: So can I…?
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
The way she asked was so cute that I was too stunned to 
immediately answer… Unable to disregard her obvious 
determination, I reluctantly agreed.

I can't keep letting her push me around like that. I had to 
learn more about Curren Chan, so I followed her on UmaSta.

"I tried the Miracle Pegasus Parfait today ♪ 
#SuperRainbow #HappyCurren♪ #CuteCurrenChan"
text_block_list.name: ＠Curren

text_block_list.text:
It was a selfie of her taking a bite of her parfait while doing a 
cute pose. "44906 Uma Likes". I looked at the comment section…

"Even though you update your UmaSta 3 times a day, 
we never see anything about your personal life"
text_block_list.name: @Curren_is_MyLife

text_block_list.text:
"I know right! Pictures are supposed to show the atmosphere that 
people live in and the people they surround themselves with!"
text_block_list.name: @cuteeeeeCurren

text_block_list.text:
"It really is a mystery. The setting and the people 
she's with changes with every picture.  Well, I 
guess the mystery only adds to the charm!"
text_block_list.name: @Curren_is_MyLife

text_block_list.text: "I've already figured it out, Curren's an alien. There's no way someone could be that perfect after all!"
text_block_list.name: @UMA_hunter

text_block_list.text:
"Plus a friend of mine's been preaching the UMA doctrine. 
It states that just like the chupacabra, 
they suck blood to retain their beauty."
text_block_list.name: @UMA_hunter

text_block_list.text:
Before I knew it I was staring at the ceiling… 
The more I try to learn about her, the less I actually know.

And so came the day of the Grand Prix qualifiers. 
The first competition was a live audition.
Everyone! You all love Curren a bunch, right? ♪
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
While exuding an aura of a star from a different universe, 
she casually melted the hearts of those watching her.
The speech competition was no different…

Today I would like to introduce everyone to something 
that'll be sure to make you prettier ♪ What I recommend 
is… this palomino cream foundation!
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text: The last of the qualifiers was a timed race competition.

Alrighty! I'm gonna give it my all♪ 
I'll make sure to burn the image of the 
sparkling Curren into the eyes of everyone watching!
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text: Kyaa! You're going to do great!
text_block_list.name: Fans

text_block_list.text:
She already has the basics down and if she runs as she normally 
does she should have a good time…  Despite my concerns, the race 
began without delay.

Yup, I'm feeling great today ♪ 
Everyone! I hope you enjoy watching my race…
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text: Huh…? Something feels weird…
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
Something seems off with her running, but the 
audience is too infatuated with her cuteness to notice.
Hyaa…!!
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
Her form seems to be suffering…! 
I don't think she'll be able to have a good result either…!
I… Can still…! Nnghh…!
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
She toughed it out and finished the race, albeit 
poorly. However, due to her previous outstanding 
results she still qualified for the finals.

Did you hear? It seems as though the horseshoe came off from her 
running shoes.  That's proof that she came into this unprepared.
text_block_list.name: Serious Horsegirl

text_block_list.text:
Just like we thought, she doesn't actually care 
about racing. If she just wants to be an idol 
she should've just gone somewhere else…
text_block_list.name: Race-loving Horsegirl

text_block_list.text:
Curren… Curren, I wish I 
didn't have to see you like this…
text_block_list.name: Bandwagon Horsegirl

text_block_list.text:
Perhaps the disappointment of her fans had reached her 
because Curren Chan stood there, slumped, at the finish line…

Terrible… this failure was absolutely terrible. 
I was so excited… it's honestly embarrassing… 
This was very uncute of me.
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text: As I am now, I'm…
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
I'm not fit to be with her… 
with Onee-chan.
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
I'm not fit to be with her… 
with Onee-chan.
text_block_list.name: Curren Chan

text_block_list.text:
Before I had a chance to talk out to her she had already left. 
She was more upset than I had expected. I feel like as the days 
pass I learn less and less about her.

If she really just wanted to be an idol, she wouldn't have gotten 
this upset from a poor showing.  So what's her real goal…?

All that was left on the track was Curren 
Chan's horseshoe, radiating a lonely, dim light…
